content.p: In keeping with the sporting focus of the City, the University has many opportunities for those who want to play sport at any level: from casual sport and University leagues, Nationwide university leagues, and elite athletes. The University has an extensive range of sport facilities, including a Sports Centre, Fitness Centre and swimming pool. The main sports facilities are located on the University Park Campus, with facilities also available at the Jubilee and Sutton Bonington campuses. There are sports bursary schemes available for outstandingly talented students who have reached international or regional standard in any sport. Over the years many Nottingham students have seen national and international success. London 2012 saw the University continue its strong Olympic tradition, with Nottingham alumni, many of whom have benefited from the Sport Department's bursary scheme, picking up five medals in the competition. Further details are available on our 'Proud to be Olympic' page. Nottingham is a major sporting city with a number of sporting heroes, renowned sports teams and first-class facilities. Find out more about sport in Nottingham.
